author: Serge
post_text: November 24, 2021 at 7:24 PM#1Hi EveryoneI have 3 different fixtures in my show and I want to control quick the movement.How can I create an macro to put ON of or OFF the movement for 1,2 or all thefixtures?Thanks for your replySerge

posts.author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
posts.post_text: January 22, 2022 at 2:46 PM#2Have a look at attached file.In this file i have setup 3 fixture types in one effect, played back from executor 101. I have used groups to define which fixtures are included in World 2. World 2 is used as a playbackfilter on executor 101. Unfortunatly MA2 requires to restart the executor to take over the changes in the worldFilesworlds.show.gz358.93 kB – 127 Downloads

title: Move On/Off selected fixtures
